LanguageData.RC2_TangoAddiction.label: tango addiction
LanguageData.RC2_TangoAddiction.description: the pawn now relies on Tango, and will become aggressive, tired, and less pain-resistant without regular dosages.
LanguageData.RC2_TangoHigh.label: tripping on tango
LanguageData.RC2_TangoHigh.description: Tango is in the pawn's system, nullifying pain and reducing blood flow.
LanguageData.RC2_TangoTolerance.label: tango tolerance
LanguageData.RC2_TangoTolerance.description: Tango has built up in the pawn's system. They more often will go on drug binges the more is built in their system.
LanguageData.RC2_TangoTolerance.stages.small-0.label: small
LanguageData.RC2_TangoTolerance.stages.small-1.label: small
LanguageData.RC2_TangoTolerance.stages.large.label: large
LanguageData.RC2_TangoTolerance.stages.massive.label: massive
